trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGZD105_05104_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Meerel Ja looks shaken.
TEXT_KINGZD105_05104_TODO_00<tab>Search for the mysterious spirit.
TEXT_KINGZD105_05104_TODO_01<tab>Follow the mysterious spirit.
TEXT_KINGZD105_05104_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the mysterious spirit.
TEXT_KINGZD105_05104_TODO_03<tab>Investigate the suspicious shrub.
TEXT_KINGZD105_05104_TODO_04<tab>Deliver the jade ring to Meerel Ja.
TEXT_KINGZD105_05104_MEERELJA_000_000<tab>I'd be wary of entering the forests right now if I were you. There's something strange on the loose out there─I saw it with my own eyes.

TEXT_KINGZD105_05104_MEERELJA_000_001<tab>It had an otherworldly look to it, more spirit-like than anything. But when it motioned for me to follow it deeper into the trees, that's when I knew it meant trouble.

TEXT_KINGZD105_05104_MEERELJA_000_002<tab>I encountered it north of Golmajiik Grove and west of the Blue-eyes' Abode. I wouldn't suggest following it...but if curiosity gets the better of you, let me know what you discover.
TEXT_KINGZD105_05104_MEERELJA_000_003<tab>I saw that spirit-like creature north of Golmajiik Grove and west of the Blue-eyes' Abode. If you discover anything, let me know.
TEXT_KINGZD105_05104_SYSTEM_000_004<tab>This must be the mysterious spirit Meerel Ja spoke of. It seems to be searching for someone to follow it...
TEXT_KINGZD105_05104_SYSTEM_100_004<tab>Follow the mysterious spirit?
TEXT_KINGZD105_05104_SYSTEM_000_005<tab>Follow the mysterious spirit and try not to fall behind.
TEXT_KINGZD105_05104_SYSTEM_000_006<tab>The mysterious spirit stops, seemingly at its destination. Perhaps it will speak with you now.
TEXT_KINGZD105_05104_SYSTEM_000_007<tab>The spirit says nothing, its gaze fixed upon the bottom of the cenote. Something must be down there.
TEXT_KINGZD105_05104_SYSTEM_000_008<tab>The spirit's gaze is fixed upon the bottom of the cenote. Perhaps it seeks something hidden down there.
TEXT_KINGZD105_05104_SYSTEM_000_009<tab>From the suspicious shrub you pull a jade ring, smeared with mud and marked with age. Someone must have dropped it.
TEXT_KINGZD105_05104_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>You no longer feel the mysterious spirit's presence. You should tell Meerel Ja what you discovered.
TEXT_KINGZD105_05104_MEERELJA_000_011<tab>Y-You didn't really follow that spirit, did you!? ...Did you learn anything?
TEXT_KINGZD105_05104_MEERELJA_000_012<tab>Why, this is the ring my grandfather lost!

TEXT_KINGZD105_05104_MEERELJA_000_013<tab>He used to live in Moxutural Zooj, before the village was abandoned. To this day, he remains devoted to the old teachings, including those regarding blessed siblings.
TEXT_KINGZD105_05104_MEERELJA_000_014<tab>He still makes customary offerings of traditional dance by the same cenote, too. Perhaps he inadvertently called that spirit forth?
TEXT_KINGZD105_05104_MEERELJA_000_015<tab>Regardless, I'm sure he'll be happy to have his ring back. Thank you, stranger.
